}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== May also be branded "Sugar Lady"
"PUMA_BB_V0.20" is etched on the board in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== ===News=== * [https://www.iot-now.com/2018/12/31/91692-peraso-demonstrate-10gbs-802-11ad-wireless-networking-ces-2019/ ''Peraso to demonstrate 10Gb/s 802.11ad wireless networking at CES 2019''] on '''IoT Now'''
